actions.text: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 72 - 350 (Roll no. 245).

description: Amendment sought to rescind an additional $65 million from the Corporation for Public Broadcasting in fiscal year 1996, and an additional $121 million in fiscal year 1997.
purpose: An amendment to increase the amount of funds to be rescinded from the Corporation for Public Broadcasting from $47 million to $112 million for Fiscal Year, and from $94 million to $215 million for Fiscal Year 1997.
